mobile-layout.name: Mobile Layout
mobile-layout.hint: Force foundry to use the Mobile layout

mobile-windows.name: Mobile Windows
mobile-windows.hint: Force the Window layout to Mobile

send-button.name: Show Send Button
send-button.hint: Allows overriding the visibility of the send button

header-button-text.name: Remove Window Header Button Text
header-button-text.hint: Removes the Text on the window header button.

send.name: Send
send.hint: Send target data to other players

receive.name: Receive
receive.hint: Receive target data from other players
